title: Refinement: Transform eget commands
description:

2. Typo/formatting in go install pattern (line 12)

3. Missing edge case tests
   - eget foo (single segment repo)
   - eget foo/bar/baz (too many segments)
   - eget foo/bar --version 1.0 (flags after repo)

Fixes required:
- Replace eget regex with strings.CutPrefix + strings.Fields logic
- Fix typo in line 12
- Add edge case tests to test coverage

title: Review: Show virtuals in install command
description:
Review implementation of virtual install instructions and related bug fixes. This review covers changes from tickets: troveler-bdt, troveler-dhg, and troveler-iwv.

Changes include:

**Ticket troveler-bdt: Virtual install instructions generation**
1. Added GenerateVirtualInstallInstructions() in internal/install/commands.go
2. Updated showAllInstalls() in commands/install.go to show virtuals
3. Updated runInfo() in commands/info.go to show virtuals
4. Updated SetTool() in tui/panels/install.go to show virtuals
5. Added comprehensive tests in internal/install/install_test.go

Key implementation details:
- Generates mise: platforms (mise:go, mise:cargo, mise:npm, mise:pipx, mise:github)
- Handles duplicates (npm/yarn/pnpm → single mise:npm)
- Skips existing mise:* platforms
- Returns results in deterministic order

**Ticket troveler-dhg: CLI override priority over mise mode**
1. commands/install.go: Only force cliOverride='LANG' when mise enabled AND no CLI override provided
2. tui/panels/install.go: Same fix for TUI panel
3. Added comprehensive tests in commands/override_test.go

Fixed: CLI parameters now have higher priority than config settings.

**Ticket troveler-iwv: Virtual platform override handling**
1. commands/install.go: Added ResolveVirtualPlatform() to map mise:* → source platform
2. Updated override logic to resolve virtual platforms before matching
3. commands/install_test.go: Added tests for virtual platform resolution
4. tui/panels/install.go: Added resolveVirtualPlatform() method for TUI panel

Fixed: -o mise:github, -o mise:go, -o mise:cargo now work correctly.

All changes:
- No new linting issues
- All existing tests pass
- All new tests added and passing

Please assess code quality, maintainability, and patterns. Score 0.0-10.0.
close_reason: Review complete - Score 8.5/10. Code quality is solid with comprehensive test coverage. Minor stylistic notes: TUI panel override resolution order differs from CLI version, and TransformToMise has no dedicated tests. However, functional correctness is verified by integration tests. No refinement required.

title: [BUG] Too thin TUI crashes
description:
If the TUI has less than 132 columns of width the program will panic (see panic.log)
## Steps to Reproduce
1. Start troveler tui with less than 132 columns or reduce the number of columns to lower than 132 when the tui is running
## Expected Behavior
Good question. Until we have an idea how to cope (scrollable windows, resized columns, etc) we just need to prevent that our app offs itself by sudoku.
close_reason: Fixed - TUI now gracefully handles narrow terminals with clear error messages instead of panicking

title: Show virtuals in install command and prefix them accordingly
description:
Currently we only show what we've parsed from the TT entry in terms of install methods.
But we have install platforms/methods that are derived from the original data e.g. mise go:, mise cargo: but now also mise github (from eget)
The table in the install command should be a union of parsed and generated commands. The platform names for the mise method are simply mise:$backend, so mise:cargo, mise:npm, mise:pipx (even if we're using uv under the hood) and mise:github (even though it's parsed from eget)
Split this ticket if more efficient / necessary

title: Transform eget commands
description:
There are occasions where you encounter no useful installation method but at least an eget command.
Turns out eget just pulls a release from github. We can do the same thing with mise with the github backend.
eget foo/bar
is the same as
mise use --global github:foo/bar
So if there's an eget command you can offer a virtual mise command (which is a mise fallback if we don't have a specific language command)
close_reason: Refinement complete - fixed typo, replaced regex with strings.CutPrefix, added edge case tests

title: Fix: CLI override should have higher priority than mise mode
description:
When mise_mode is enabled (from config or --mise flag), the CLI --override flag should still be respected. Currently, if mise mode is on, any -o flag is ignored because cliOverride is forced to 'LANG' before checking the CLI value.

Fix: Only force cliOverride='LANG' when mise mode is enabled AND no CLI override was provided by the user. CLI parameters should have higher priority than config settings.
close_reason:
Fixed CLI override priority issue. When mise mode is enabled (via --mise flag or config), CLI --override flag now properly overrides the LANG behavior. 

Changes:
- commands/install.go: Only force cliOverride='LANG' when mise enabled AND no CLI override provided
- tui/panels/install.go: Same fix for TUI panel
- Added comprehensive tests in commands/override_test.go

CLI parameters now have higher priority than config settings as intended.

title: Fix: Override should handle virtual mise:* platforms
description:
When using --override with virtual platforms like mise:github or mise:go, the command selection fails because it only looks for raw platforms.

Virtual platforms are generated for display but the override matching logic doesn't know how to resolve them back to their source platforms (mise:github → github, mise:go → go).

Fix: Add virtual platform resolution in override logic to map mise:* platforms back to their source platforms before matching.
close_reason:
Fixed virtual platform override handling. Added ResolveVirtualPlatform() to map mise:* platforms back to their source platforms (mise:github → github, mise:go → go, etc.).

Changes:
- commands/install.go: Added ResolveVirtualPlatform() and updated override logic
- commands/install_test.go: Added comprehensive tests for virtual platform resolution
- tui/panels/install.go: Added resolveVirtualPlatform() method for TUI panel

Now -o mise:github, -o mise:go, -o mise:cargo all work correctly.
